titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the right of citizens of the United States to health care of equal high quality.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States regarding the right of citizens of the United States to health care of equal high quality.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

bill.summary: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that all persons shall enjoy the right to equal, high quality health care.
